content: yo k1 yo k3 row 04 p8 k1fb k2 slm p to m slm k4 row 05 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p2 k3 yo k1 yo k4 row 06 p10 k1fb k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 07 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p3 ssk k5 k2tog k1 row 08 p8 k1fb p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 09 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p1 k1 p2 ssk k3 k2tog k1 chart key row 10 p6 k1fb k1 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 11 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p1 k1 p3 ssk k1 k2tog k1 rs knit ssk row 12 p4 k1fb k2 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 ws purl row 13 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p1 k1 p4 slk2p k1 yarn over row 14 p2tog bind off 3 k1 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 k2tog no stitch repeat row 1-14 until slk2p a desired length is achieved remember you will be mirroring the increase section and adding to the length rs purl b there are ten straight leaves + six increase leaves = 16 leaves ws knit bind off total c you ve used one-half 1/2 of your yarn rs & ws switch to decrease sections knit thru p2tog front & back loops designed by liz abinante feministy com | support@feministy com | ravelry feministy | twitter feministy decrease section each repeat will give you one leaf six leaves are shown in the sample pay attention to the instructions at the end row 01 k4 slm k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 slm k3 yo k1 yo k2 row 02 p6 k1fb k1 slm p to m slm k4 row 03 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p1 k2 yo k1 yo k3 row 04 p8 k1fb k2 slm p to m slm k4 row 05 k4 slm k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 slm k2 p2 k3 yo k1 yo k4 row 06 p10 k1fb k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 07 k4 slm k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 slm k2 p3 ssk k5 k2tog k1 row 08 p8 k1fb p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 09 k4 slm k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 slm k2 p1 k1 p2 ssk k3 k2tog k1 row 10 p6 k1fb k1 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 11 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p1 k1 p3 ssk k1 k2tog k1 row 12 p4 k1fb k2 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 13 k4 slm k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 slm k2 p1 k1 p4 slk2p k1 row 14 p2tog bind off 3 k1 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 repeat row 1-14 the same number of times you did for the increase section on
